meanings.definition: A small switch operated by very slight pressure.
meanings.sent1: The microswitches in the remote control make changing channels easy.
meanings.sent2: I had to replace the microswitches in my computer mouse to fix the clicking issue.
meanings.sent3: The tiny microswitches in the toy robot made it dance in funny ways.
meanings.sent4: Her decision to leave the job was like flipping a series of microswitches in her mind.
meanings.sent5: The microswitches on the circuit board resembled tiny buttons waiting to be pressed.

meanings.definition: A switch that is actuated by very small movements.
meanings.sent1: The microswitches on the door automatically turn off the lights when closed.
meanings.sent2: The microswitches on the treadmill control the speed of the belt.
meanings.sent3: The microswitches on the vending machine made it seem like a magical snack dispenser.
meanings.sent4: His words acted like tiny microswitches, triggering her emotions with precision.
meanings.sent5: The microswitches in the security system were so sensitive, even a whisper could set them off.
